clusters.title: 14yo girl allegedly stripped, whipped with phone cord and recorded by teen trio
clusters.neutral_headline: Teen Girls Allegedly Attack and Strip 14-Year-Old in Sydney
bullet_summary: Police said the 14-year-old victim was approached at a bus stop in Claymore about 7pm on Friday by three girls, all aged 13, and threatened at knifepoint
Reported by ABC News Australia, The Age, 9News

items.title: 14yo girl allegedly stripped, whipped with phone cord and recorded by teen trio
items.standfirst: Three 13-year-old girls are set to front the Children's Court after allegedly beating, stripping and whipping a 14-year-old girl in Sydney's south-west overnight.
items.content: Three 13-year-old girls are set to front the Children's Court after allegedly beating, stripping and whipping a 14-year-old girl in Sydney's south-west overnight.

items.title: Three teenage girls ‘stripped’ and beat girl, 14, in Sydney’s south-west: police
items.standfirst: Police said the 14-year-old victim was approached at a bus stop in Claymore about 7pm on Friday by three girls, all aged 13, and threatened at knifepoint.
items.content: Police said the 14-year-old victim was approached at a bus stop in Claymore about 7pm on Friday by three girls, all aged 13, and threatened at knifepoint.

items.title: Trio of teens allegedly force 14-year-old to strip before beating her on camera
items.standfirst: The 14-year-old was approached by three teen girls at a bus stop in Claymore, near Campbelltown, at 7pm yesterday.
items.content: A Sydney teenage girl has been stripped and beaten in a shocking incident, allegedly committed by three 13-year-old girls, who police say recorded the assault.The 14-year-old girl was approached by three teen girls at a bus stop in Claymore, near Campbelltown, at 7pm yesterday.Police allege the 14-year-old was forced to the edge of Longstaff Way while being held at knifepoint by the teens.READ MORE: Woman killed, three seriously injured in two-car collision north of AdelaideThey then allegedly started to punch and kick her. The teens then allegedly forced her to take off her clothes, whipping her with a phone cord while recording her.The trip then fled, taking the girl's top, pants, shoes and phone with them. Police say the girls were known to her.PolAir was used to search for the girls allegedly involved , with three 13-year-olds arrested in Claymore.READ MORE: Accused cold case killer bailed but case against him 'not weak'Their phones were seized and the trio were taken to Campbelltown Police Station where they have been charged.One 13-year-old was charged with aggravated robbery with an offensive weapon, an offence related to forcing a child to make child abuse material and possessing child abuse material.The two others were charged with two offences, aggravated robbery with an offensive weapon, and aggravated causing a child 14 years or over to make child abuse material.All three have been refused bail and will appear in childres court today.

clusters.ai_summary:
• Three teenage girls are facing court.
• They allegedly beat and stripped a 14-year-old.
• The incident occurred in Sydney's south-west.
• The victim was approached at a bus stop.
• The girls are all aged thirteen.
